{"id":1235310974,"question_id":6,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1713400356,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1235310974/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"44.8 MB","code":"public class Solution {\n    public String convert(String s, int numRows) {\n        if (numRows == 1) {\n            return s;\n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder[] rows = new StringBuilder[Math.min(numRows, s.length())];  // Initialize rows\n        for (int i = 0; i < rows.length; i++) {\n            rows[i] = new StringBuilder();\n        }\n        \n        int currRow = 0;\n        boolean goingDown = false;\n        \n        for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {\n            rows[currRow].append(c);\n            if (currRow == 0 || currRow == numRows - 1) {\n                goingDown = !goingDown;\n            }\n            currRow += goingDown ? 1 : -1;\n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();\n        for (StringBuilder row : rows) {\n            result.append(row);\n        }\n        return result.toString();\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
